name: CalendarManager
description: Manages calendar events and tasks. Supports Google Calendar and Outlook Calendar.
author: ApexAgent Team

actions.name: create_event
actions.description: Creates a new event on the specified calendar service.

parameters.name: attendees
parameters.description: Optional list of attendee email addresses

actions.name: get_event
actions.description: Retrieves an event from the specified calendar service.

parameters.name: event_id
parameters.description: ID of the event to retrieve

returns.description: Event details or null if not found

actions.name: list_events
actions.description: Lists events from the specified calendar service within a time range.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start of the time range (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.name: end_time
parameters.description: End of the time range (ISO 8601 format)

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Maximum number of events to return
